ISSUE.TITLE: Changing settings doesn't alter Github webhooks
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Changing repository settings doesn't alter Github webhooks. For example, we want to disable pull requests from triggering Drone builds but unchecking that checkbox doesn't change Github webhook settings.
